Title: Relates to the display of a bus driver's credentials
Summary: Requires the display of a bus driver's credentials prominently while he or she is on duty and changes the review of his or her files by the department from every three years to annually.
LawCode: Add ยง509-dd, amd ยง509-m, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the displaying of a bus driver's credentials while he or she is on duty and the review of his or her files
